message.description: The message. For now it's 'TRIPLETEN service' but may contain the API version and other information.

statusCode.description: The returned statusCode. It's the same as the returned HTTP status code.

get.description: It returns an object with the 'message' key and the legend 'TRIPLETEN service'. In the future, it may display the API version (TBD).

parameters.name: Content-Type
parameters.description: Content Type header. Only 'application/json' is supported in this version.
